1.name: The Silence of the Lambs
1.description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

2.name: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
2.description: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her teenage son, John Connor, from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

3.name: Point Break
3.description: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

4.name: Beauty and the Beast
4.description: A prince cursed to spend his days as a hideous monster sets out to regain his humanity by earning a young woman's love.

5.name: Hook
5.description: When Captain Hook kidnaps his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and reclaim his youthful spirit in order to challenge his old enemy.

6.name: The Addams Family
6.description: Con artists plan to fleece an eccentric family using an accomplice who claims to be their long-lost uncle.

7.name: Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey
7.description: A tyrant from the future creates evil android doubles of Bill and Ted and sends them back to eliminate the originals.

8.name: Cape Fear
8.description: A convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a fourteen-year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer who originally defended him.

9.name: Yuk po tuen: Tau ching bo gam
9.description: A recently married scholar goes on a quest for knowledge of other people's wives, based on his philosophical differences with the Sack Monk. He encounters the Flying Thief, who agrees to ...                See full summary »

10.name: Thelma & Louise
10.description: Two best friends set out on an adventure, but it soon turns around to a terrifying escape from being hunted by the police, as these two girls escape for the crimes they committed.

11.name: My Girl
11.description: A young girl, on the threshold of her teen years, finds her life turning upside down, when she is accompanied by an unlikely friend.

12.name: Boyz n the Hood
12.description: Follows the lives of three young males living in the Crenshaw ghetto of Los Angeles, dissecting questions of race, relationships, violence and future prospects.

13.name: Career Opportunities
13.description: Jim is the dorky son of a local cement contractor who lives at home and has no direction. Josie is the gorgeous daughter of a wealthy businessman who dreams of leaving town. They find they have a lot in common.

14.name: My Own Private Idaho
14.description: Two best friends living on the streets of Portland as hustlers embark on a journey of self discovery and find their relationship stumbling along the way.

15.name: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
15.description: When Robin and his Moorish companion come to England and the tyranny of the Sheriff of Nottingham, he decides to fight back as an outlaw.

16.name: Backdraft
16.description: Two Chicago firefighter brothers, who don't get along, have to work together while a dangerous arsonist is on the loose.

17.name: Child's Play 3
17.description: Chucky returns for revenge against Andy, the young boy who defeated him, and now a teenager living in a military academy.

18.name: The Doors
18.description: The story of the famous and influential 1960s rock band The Doors and its lead singer and composer, Jim Morrison, from his days as a UCLA film student in Los Angeles, to his untimely death in Paris, France at age 27 in 1971.

19.name: Drop Dead Fred
19.description: A young woman finds her already unstable life rocked by the presence of a rambunctious imaginary friend from childhood.

20.name: Double Impact
20.description: Twin brothers are separated when their parents are murdered but 25 years later they re-unite in order to avenge their parents' death.

21.name: JFK
21.description: New Orleans District Attorney Jim Garrison discovers there's more to the Kennedy assassination than the official story.

22.name: Fried Green Tomatoes
22.description: A housewife who is unhappy with her life befriends an old lady in a nursing home and is enthralled by the tales she tells of people she used to know.

23.name: Hot Shots!
23.description: A parody of Top Gun (1986) in which a talented but unstable fighter pilot must overcome the ghosts of his father and save a mission sabotaged by greedy weapons manufacturers.

24.name: Nothing But Trouble
24.description: A businessman and his friends are captured by a sadistic judge and his equally odd family in the backwoods of a bizarre mansion.

25.name: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead
25.description: Five siblings are left alone all summer when their mom leaves town and the evil babysitter bites the dust.

26.name: Daughters of the Dust
26.description: Languid look at the Gullah culture of the sea islands off the coast of South Carolina and Georgia where African folk-ways were maintained well into the 20th Century and was one of the last ...                See full summary »

27.name: Return to the Blue Lagoon
27.description: In this sequel to The Blue Lagoon (1980), two children are stranded on a beautiful island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together and eventually become suntanned teenagers in love.

28.name: The Rocketeer
28.description: A young pilot stumbles onto a prototype jetpack that allows him to become a high flying masked hero.

29.name: City Slickers
29.description: On the verge of turning 40, an unhappy Manhattan yuppie is roped into joining his two friends on a cattle drive in the southwest.

30.name: What About Bob?
30.description: A successful psychotherapist loses his mind after one of his most dependent patients, an obsessive-compulsive neurotic, tracks him down during his family vacation.

31.name: The People Under the Stairs
31.description: Two adults and a juvenile break into a house occupied by a brother and sister and their stolen children. There, they must fight for their lives.

32.name: The Last Boy Scout
32.description: A private detective's protected female witness is murdered, prompting him and the victim's boyfriend to investigate the crime that leads to a corrupt politician and a crooked football team owner.

33.name: The Fisher King
33.description: A former radio DJ, suicidally despondent because of a terrible mistake he made, finds redemption in helping a deranged homeless man who was an unwitting victim of that mistake.

34.name: Father of the Bride
34.description: With his oldest daughter's wedding approaching, a father finds himself reluctant to let go.

35.name: Naked Lunch
35.description: After developing an addiction to the substance he uses to kill bugs, an exterminator accidentally kills his wife, and becomes involved in a secret government plot being orchestrated by giant bugs in a port town in North Africa.

36.name: The Man in the Moon
36.description: A coming of age story set in the south of the U.S. when Elvis was King.

37.name: Paprika
37.description: A young country girl comes to town and works in a brothel in order to help her fiance get the money to start his own business. "Paprika" is the name given to her by the madam.

38.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II: The Secret of the Ooze
38.description: The Turtles and the Shredder battle once again, this time for the last canister of the ooze that created the Turtles, with which Shredder wants to unleash an army of new mutants.

39.name: Barton Fink
39.description: A renowned New York playwright is enticed to California to write for the movies and discovers the hellish truth of Hollywood.

40.name: Toy Soldiers
40.description: When terrorists seize control of a boarding school, a group of troublemaking boys decide to resist them.

41.name: Hudson Hawk
41.description: A cat burglar is forced to steal Da Vinci works of art for a world domination plot.

42.name: Harley Davidson and the Marlboro Man
42.description: Forced by the imminent foreclosure of their friend's bar, two lifelong buddies will decide to rob a bank's armoured car, not knowing that its cargo is not money but a new street drug.

43.name: Sleeping with the Enemy
43.description: A young woman fakes her own death in an attempt to escape her nightmarish marriage, but discovers it is impossible to elude her controlling husband.

44.name: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
44.description: On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.

45.name: Defending Your Life
45.description: In an afterlife way station resembling a block of hotels, the lives of the recently-deceased are examined in a court-like setting.

46.name: Pure Luck
46.description: The daughter of a wealthy businessman has disappeared in Mexico, and all the efforts to find her have been unsuccessful. A psychologist, knowing that the girl has an ultra bad luck, ...                See full summary »

47.name: La belle noiseuse
47.description: The former famous painter Frenhofer revisits an abandoned project using the girlfriend of a young visiting artist. Questions about truth, life, and artistic limits are explored.

48.name: The Commitments
48.description: When Jimmy Rabbitte wants to start a band, he has open auditions at his house.

49.name: Night on Earth
49.description: An anthology of 5 different cab drivers in 5 American and European cities and their remarkable fares on the same eventful night.

50.name: Grand Canyon
50.description: The fates of several people are intertwining randomly. Their sympathy of each other faces multiple differences in their lifestyles.
